casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MCCLURG 2018-1410 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appeal accepted and cause held for State v. Howard, case No. 2018-0376, and briefing scheduled stayed. Appellant's motion to amend cover pages granted.

Kennedy and O'Donnell, JJ., dissent and would not accept the appeal.
